There's only one way to refute being called a show horse: You've got to take it in front of a huge audience, he told his huge audience. Although Mike Pence is skilled at the messaging side of politics, he has less experience as an executive-- something that could be an issue for someone who aspires to be governor

it was Kenyon Martin 's defense that had coach George Karl talking. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Carmelo Anthony added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than making shots. I thought Kenyon Martin was the star of the game.'' JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a

win with a critical rebound and putback with 43 seconds left. Carmelo Anthony 's work on the boards earned glowing praise from Allen Iverson after the game. He finished with 14 rebounds, two shy of his career high. When he puts his mind to it, he can do anything on the basketball court, Allen Iverson said.`` He can dominate in every aspect. Rebounding, that's all effort. When Carmelo Anthony gets down low and starts banging with those guys, it's hard for people to defend him.''

What I most want is for him to have a long future, Marjorie Dannenfelser said.`` So I'm sure that he's made a discernment that this is the right move.'' Former Rep.
